value.title: StarCraft 2: Clem's Terran vs Zerg is INSANE! (Solar vs Clem)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Solar and Clem. In this Terran versus Zerg we watch Clem take control of the early game, but Solar managed to stay alive and strikes back in the late game. value.title: StarCraft 2: Cure NUKES His Own Base! (herO vs Cure)
value.excerpt: Professional match of top level Korean StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and Cure (Terran). While Cure opens up with some strange decisions, ultimately he gets to comfortably macro on three bases. herO tries to find weaknesses in his defense, but is forced to face a maxed out Terran army.
